function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clear and reliable information about the disease and control measures","Impact":"Misunderstanding and spread of misinformation leading to increased risk of contagion","Mitigation":"Effective use of communication technology and two-way dialogue for information dissemination","Technologies":"Radio, social media, and Q&A sessions with experts","People":"General population, particularly vulnerable groups such as the elderly and disabled","Owner":"Local governments, humanitarian agencies, NGOs"},{"Description":"Inability to provide specific guidance and protective equipment for essential workers","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion among essential workers and their communities","Mitigation":"Provision of protective equipment and engagement with local unions and professional associations","Technologies":"Protective equipment, communication technology for engagement with unions and associations","People":"Essential workers and their communities","Owner":"Local governments, unions, professional associations"},{"Description":"Inadequate alternatives for mass religious gatherings","Impact":"Higher risk of contagion due to large religious gatherings","Mitigation":"Engagement with religious leaders to create safe alternatives over radio or social media","Technologies":"Radio, social media","People":"Community members attending religious gatherings","Owner":"Local governments, religious leaders"}]}
